gobblin.writer

Class Destination

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.writer.Destination

  • public class Destination
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing a destination for a writer to write to. It currently supports HDFS and Kafka as destinations.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Destination.DestinationType
      Enumeration of supported destination types.
